segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar, and it makes me fearful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far up, balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his sister standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how focused he is on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink has no idea what's happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that the children are being so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost within his reach, but the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks excited, her hand outstretched towards the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or make a bigger mess than there already is.
segments.speaker: PAR
